defensive_measures.title: Securing the Network
defensive_measures.description: Security Chief Kade spreads out patrol assignments: 'We're posting guards at every major junction and installing surveillance systems at vulnerable points. The problem is resources - protecting everything means we're spread thin. If they hit multiple targets simultaneously, we won't be able to respond to them all.'

choices.text: 'Focus protection on the most critical nodes.'
'We need to find their base of operations and strike first.'
'Can we set up decoy targets to draw them out?'
'This defensive approach isn't enough - we need intelligence.'
